statements: DELETE FROM CustomerPurchases WHERE customer_id = 123 AND purchase_category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE total_amount < 100);
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < (SELECT MAX(purchase_date) FROM purchases);
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe');
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 100 AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM orders WHERE orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id AND orders.total_amount < 500.00);
